scripts.test: jest --coverage && ts-node scripts/TestAllDownloads.ts && ts-node scripts/TestIntegration.ts && ts-node scripts/TestGetExecutable.ts && ts-node scripts/HashUrls.ts https://github.com/mpizenberg/elm-test-rs/releases/download/v1.0/elm-test-rs_linux.tar.gz https://github.com/mpizenberg/elm-test-rs/releases/download/v1.0/elm-test-rs_macos.tar.gz https://github.com/mpizenberg/elm-test-rs/releases/download/v1.0/elm-test-rs_windows.zip
